column1: #text=I was feeling like relaxing after a long day , so I had the idea to take a bath .
#text=Then I started the water and adjusted the temperature with the faucet .
#text=I grabbed some bath oils and put them in the water .
#text=Once the water was high enough , I stepped into the tub .
#text=I slid my body underneath the water .
#text=Steam drifted up from the surface of the water .
#text=I felt my muscles loosening up and relaxing .
#text=The bath oils gave off a minty aroma .
#text=After some time luxuriating in the water , I took my washcloth and put some soap on it .
#text=I began to soap up my skin .
#text=I started with my face , then worked my way down to my feet .
#text=Once I went over my whole body , I rinsed off the washcloth and hung it up .
#text=The water began to feel lukewarm , so I decided to end my bath .
#text=I took out the stopper and stepped out of the tub .
